var t_pass = t.done.bind(t);

    throw reason;
});
t.step(function() {

  var canvas = new OffscreenCanvas(100, 50);
  var ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

  ctx.save();
  ctx.restore();
  t.done();

});
</script>
